SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
The AbstractDAO class provides generic data access operations for CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on database entities.
AddClient
A graphical user interface for adding client information.
AddProduct
A graphical user interface for adding product information.
Bill
A record representing a bill containing information such as the timestamp, client name, product name, total price, and quantity.
Client
A class representing a client with properties such as client ID, name, email, address, and phone number.
ClientBLL
 
ClientDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for interacting with the 'client' table in the database.
ClientOperations
A graphical user interface for performing various client operations.
ConnectionFactory
A utility class for managing database connections.
DeleteClient
A graphical user interface for deleting clients.
DeleteProduct
A graphical user interface for deleting products.
EmailValidator
The EmailValidator class validates the format of email addresses for clients.
ListAll<T>
The ListAll class generates a table to display a list of items dynamically.
Main
 
MainView
The MainView class represents the main window of the Warehouse Managing System.
MakeANewOrder
The MakeANewOrder class represents the window for making a new order.
NegativeQuantity
The NegativeQuantity class represents an exception that is thrown when a negative quantity is encountered.
Order
A class representing an order made by a client for a product.
OrderBLL
The OrderBLL class handles business logic operations related to orders.
Product
A class representing a product in the inventory.
ProductBLL
The ProductBLL class handles business logic operations related to products.
ProductDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for interacting with the Product table in the database.
ProductOperations
The ProductOperations class represents the window for product operations.
QuantityValidator
The QuantityValidator class is responsible for validating if a quantity is positive.
UpdateClient
The UpdateClient class represents the window for updating client information.
UpdateProduct
The UpdateProduct class represents the window for updating product information.
Validator<T>
The Validator interface defines a contract for validation operations.
